subject: Re: [PATCH v4 28/31] mm: workingset: use lruvec_lru_size() to get the number of lru pages

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Qi Zheng suggested using lruvec_lru_size() to get the number of LRU pages in count_shadow_nodes(), but no specific technical concerns were raised.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Reviewer Shakeel Butt suggested improvements to the patch series, including using lruvec_lru_size() to get the number of LRU pages and adding comments to explain reparenting logic.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised a concern that the patch may break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: Reviewer Harry Yoo suggested changing the type of nr_pages in mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() from int to long, and approved the patch.
